install.name: GCalendar Upcoming Events
install.author: G4J Project
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: This module shows the upcoming events from a google calendar.

param.name: dateFormat
param.label: Date format
param.description: The format of the date for an event (see http://www.php.net/strftime for details).

param.name: timeFormat
param.label: Time format
param.description: The format of the time for an event (see http://www.php.net/strftime for details).

param.name: count
param.label: Max events
param.description: The maximal count of events should be displayed.

param.name: order
param.label: Sort Order
param.description: The order strategy of the events.

param.name: find
param.label: Event Search
param.description: Find events whose title/description contain this string. Standard Google search expressions are allowed (e.g. "find only me", "-dont_find_me", find this that)

param.name: max_events
param.label: Events to download
param.description: Limit the number of events for download (not display) to this number.

param.name: offset
param.label: Event Order Offset
param.description: Show the event X number of events after the immediate next event

param.name: title_filter
param.label: Event Title Filter
param.description: Show only events with titles that match this regular expression

param.name: start_date
param.label: Start Date
param.description: Limit to events that have only started since this date (can be relative)

param.name: end_date
param.label: End Date
param.description: Limit to events that will start before date (can be relative)

param.name: textbefore
param.label: Content before events
param.description: This text will be displayed before the event list.

param.name: output
param.label: Event output
param.description: Here you can customize the appearance of the event.

Here you can modify the event output. The following attributes of an event are provided:
{title}, {description}, {startdate}, {starttime}, {dateseparator}, {enddate}, {endtime} {where}, {backlink}, {link}, {maplink}, {calendarname}, {calendarcolor}

param.name: textafter
param.label: Content after events
param.description: This text will be displayed after the event list.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module.

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached in sec.
